meanings.definition: Aldolases: enzymes that catalyze the cleavage of aldol compounds
meanings.sent1: The aldolases in our bodies help break down sugars for energy.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study aldolases to understand how enzymes work in cells.
meanings.sent3: The aldolases at the sugar factory were on strike, causing a sweet chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like aldolases, breaking down barriers in her path.
meanings.sent5: The aldolases worked tirelessly, like tiny sugar-cutting machines in the cell.

meanings.definition: Aldolases: proteins involved in the aldol reaction in organic chemistry
meanings.sent1: Organic chemists use aldolases to create new molecules in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The students learned about aldolases and their role in chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The aldolases at the chemistry party were the life of the reaction.
meanings.sent4: His ideas mixed together like aldolases in a test tube, creating a brilliant solution.
meanings.sent5: In the world of chemistry, aldolases are the architects of molecular construction.
